pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Aggressive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Dark Oak Ent Tree.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)N/A$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() 18-24 $(item)Dark Oak Logs$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Dark Oak Leaves$() or 1-4 $(item)Dark Oak Saplings$(), Chance between 1-4 $(item)Red Mushrooms$() or 1-4 $(item)Brown Mushrooms$(), 1 $(item)Cornflower$() 85%% chance of 1-2 $(item)Diamonds$().

pages.title: Description
pages.text: An ancient like creature of anger, wood, and flowers, The Dark Oak Ent is a massive creature that stands taller than most mobs in the world, as well as bulkier and stronger than most. Dark Oak Ents are one of the strongest and angriest Ents of any Ent in Chaos Awakens.  The poisoned mind from flora and their strength makes them a worthy foe.
